error.message: Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\user\Entity\User. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Declaration of Drupal\enterprise_search\Plugin\search_api\backend\EnterpriseSearchApiPlugin::getAutocompleteSuggestions(Drupal\search_api\Query\QueryInterface $query, Drupal\search_api_autocomplete\SearchInterface $search, $incomplete_key, $user_input) should be compatible with Drupal\search_api_solr\Plugin\search_api\backend\SearchApiSolrBackend::getAutocompleteSuggestions(Drupal\search_api\Query\QueryInterface $query, $search, $incomplete_key, $user_input)
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to enterprise_search.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
